articles.description: The summary includes key updates on US domestic affairs, highlighting vulnerabilities in battleground states, legal victories and ongoing investigations. articles.title: Trump labels Venezuela a dictatorship amid election controversy
articles.description: Donald Trump declared Venezuela to be run by a dictator, referencing the recent highly contentious presidential election. He also criticized the country’s crime rates and accused the government of moving criminals into the United States.
